nodes.text: Boris Vallejo is the cover artist of The Art of Star Wars Galaxy: Volume Two. He also contributed to the artwork book Star Wars Art: Visions.
Vallejo illustrated the 1999 Jedi Readers title Dangers of the Core, written by Jim Thomas.
He was the illustrator of Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back: Special 40th Anniversary Collector's Edition, published on June 1, 2021.
